entities.name: lupin
entities.description: Lupin is introduced as a person who shakes hands with Harry and asks him how he's doing. He is described as looking at Harry closely.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is introduced as the one being asked by Lupin about his well-being. He is described as feeling conscious of not having combed his hair for four days.

entities.name: dursleys
entities.description: The Dursleys are mentioned as being out due to a letter sent by the violet-haired woman. They think they have been short-listed for a competition.

entities.name: violet-haired woman
entities.description: She is introduced as the one who lured the Dursleys out of the way by sending them a letter about a competition. She has violet hair.

entities.name: muggle post
entities.description: Muggle post is mentioned as the method used to send the letter to the Dursleys.

entities.name: all-england best-kept suburban lawn competition
entities.description: This is a competition that the Dursleys think they have been short-listed for. It's mentioned as a way to lure them out of the house.

relationships.description: Lupin shakes hands with Harry, showing a friendly gesture.
The violet-haired woman lured the Dursleys out of the house by sending them a letter about a competition.
The violet-haired woman used Muggle post to send the letter to the Dursleys.
The Dursleys think they have been short-listed for this competition.
